code: import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./navbar.css';var NavBar=function NavBar(){useEffect(function(){window.onscroll=function(){myFunction();};var nav=document.querySelector(".nav");var sticky=nav.offsetTop;function myFunction(){if(window.pageYOffset>=sticky){nav.classList.add("sticky");}else{nav.classList.remove("sticky");}}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"nav",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"nav__list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/#home",className:"nav__item",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/#about",className:"nav__item",children:"About Us"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/#stones",className:"nav__item",children:"Stones"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/#contact",className:"nav__item",children:"Contact"})]})});};export default NavBar;
